elements.contents:
300.000€
House 2 bedrooms Rogil Aljezur - equipped kitchen, barbecue
prev
next
83,50m²  104,60m²REF PV-M-547

Sale
T2 Semi-detached House, 1 double bedroom with Queen size Bed 1 single bedroom with 2 beds, 1 bathroom, 1 guest toilet, kitchen total equipped in Open Space with living and dining area. With pleasant outdoor space, consisting of a leisure area, meals with barbecue. In a privileged area close to all amenities.
Add to Favorites

elements.title: Farm 4 bedrooms Brejo da Moita Rogil Aljezur - electricity, water, well (Provenda)
elements.contents:
660.000€
Farm 4 bedrooms Brejo da Moita Rogil Aljezur - electricity, water, well
prev
next
340m²  73.720m²REF PV-T-546

Sale
Property located in the heart of Costa Vicentina, with 2 Houses, close to the sea and beaches. With lots of vegetation, with excellent land to promote agricultural activities . Water supplied through the public network, the Irrigation Channel , existing Wells in the property and from a dam. Electricity and telephone supply - public network. Excellent sun exposure.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

elements.title: Farm 3 bedrooms Aljezur - tank, garden, fruit trees, mains water, water (Provenda)
elements.contents:
310.000€
Farm 3 bedrooms Aljezur - tank, garden, fruit trees, mains water, water
prev
next
Reserved
370,06m²  15.100m²REF PV-T-543

Sale
Property with fabulous views over Aljezur. Located 700 meters from the village, with an area of 15.100sqm, covered area of 370.06sqm, consisting of a dwelling and warehouses, two of which are separate from the main house. Supplied with electricity and water from the public network, the existing tank is used for watering the garden, vegetable garden, fruit trees and seasonal crops. Great Investment!
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

elements.title: Farm Canada Aljezur - water, electricity, cork oaks (Provenda)
elements.contents:
295.000€
Farm Canada Aljezur - water, electricity, cork oaks
prev
next
Reserved
62m²  62.750m²REF PV-T-544

Sale
Beautiful property with 62.750sqm, comprising a forest area with pine trees, cork oaks and arbutus trees. In this property there is a house in ruins with 62sqm with the possibility of expansion up to 300sqm. Easy access, about 5 km from Praia da Amoreira and less than 1 km from Aljezur. Public Water and Electricity.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

elements.title: House/Villa 3+1 bedrooms Marmelete Monchique (Provenda)
elements.contents:
318.500€
House/Villa 3+1 bedrooms Marmelete Monchique
prev
next
136m²  308,70m²REF PV-M-545

Sale
Picturesque building renovated in 2020. Renovation included structure and new roof. The building is divided into 3 fractions (Studio, T1 and T2) Very versatile space, which allows immediate profitability of the space. The renovation was carried out respecting the environment and using natural materials You will immediately feel at home, with the colors, textures and good vibe. Charming place where you can live with your family and friends 15 minutes from Aljezur and only 20 minutes from the main beaches
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

elements.title: Farm 3+1 bedrooms Amorosa Aljezur (Provenda)
elements.contents:
800.000€
Farm 3+1 bedrooms Amorosa Aljezur
prev
next
300m²  110.000m²REF PV-T-542

Sale
Exclusive property, located next to Amoreira Beach. With fabulous views over the Sea and the Aljezur River. Unique opportunity, given this fabulous setting, in the Natural Park of the Costa Vicentina , to enjoy this surroundings, with great areas-land and housing(this can be expanded). Lagos is only 25 minutes away and Faro airport is about 70 minutes.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

elements.title: Farm 6 bedrooms Fonte Ferrenha Cardal Odeceixe Aljezur - water, good access, electricity (Provenda)

790.000€

prev
next
357m²  154.920m²REF PV-T-540

Sale
Excellent property with 15,492 HA, with 2 old buildings with a total area of 357sqm. Located in the Natural Park of Costa Vicentina, close to the coastal zone. With good access, quiet area, surrounded by a beautiful landscape and with great solar orientation. Possibility of expansion of the construction area, up to 500sqm. Supplied with water through the irrigation canal and electricity from the public network.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

Sold

House well located in Rogil, in a quiet area, Walking Access to the market, pharmacy, schools, supermarket, and other amenities. With parking, garden with fruit trees and vegetable garden. With good solar orientation, being the social zone exposed to the South. 2.5 Km from the beaches and 4 km from Aljezur.

Old House situated in the heart of the quiet village of Odeceixe, near the Beach of Odeceixe. Composed of Living Room, Kitchen, 1 TOILET, 2 Bedrooms and Basement (Access by the Street). Great opportunity to invest and live, in this area so special that is the Costa Vicentina.

elements.title: Farm 3 bedrooms to recover Pero Vicente Rogil Aljezur - electricity, water (Provenda)
elements.contents:
290.000€
Farm 3 bedrooms to recover Pero Vicente Rogil Aljezur - electricity, water
prev
next
120m²  68.960m²REF PV-T-527

Sale
Excellent property, extremely well located, bordering the Sea, a few meters away from the Beach Vale dos Homens. With semi-detached Old house of taipa to recover with 120sqm. Good land for agriculture, supplied by water irrigation of dam mira and electricity from the public network. With a sun exposure totally to the south and with great panoramic views. Close to Rogil, 10 minutes from Aljezur and Lagos 30 minutes away. Unique opportunity to live in this space so Special, which is the Costa Vicentina.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

elements.title: Land Agricultural with 200sqm Monte Clérigo Odeceixe Aljezur - electricity, water, cork oaks (Provenda)
elements.contents:
600.000€
Land Agricultural with 200sqm Monte Clérigo Odeceixe Aljezur - electricity, water, cork oaks
prev
next
Sold
200m²  552.750m²REF PV-T-523

Sale
Property situated on the Costa Vicentina, close to Odeceixe and 8.5 km from Aljezur. Easy access, about 1.5 km from EN 120. With a Unique Natural Beauty, having several clusters of trees, pinetrees and corkoak trees, a charming Spring and nooks overlooking the Serra de Monchique. The ruin, benefits from excellent sun exposure, and can be enlarged up to 300sqm. With great potential in the development of a Rural Tourism (600sqm), Reforestation and/or Agricultural Project. Water and Electricity from public network.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information
